JCMS 9.0.1 API

This document is the API specification for Jalios JCMS 9.0

The classes around which you'll find the most useful informations are: Channel, to retrieving data, to access site properties, to register StoreListener, DataController and AlarmEntry, etc. JcmsUtil, for miscelleanous convenient methods completing Util and ServletUtil Data, Publication, Content Workspace, Group, Member

See: Description

Package Description
com.jalios.jcms
Contains the core JCMS classes.

JaliosUtil Packages 
Package Description
com.jalios.io
Contains Jalios utility I/O classes (stream pumpers, MultiInputStream and miscellaneous utility static methods).

com.jalios.io.ssl  
com.jalios.ldap
Contains Jalios LDAP utility classes.
com.jalios.util
Contains Jalios utility classes (Unix-like crypt class, RSS parser, mail utility, servlet utility, comparators and miscellaneous utility static methods).
com.jalios.util.diff  
com.jalios.util.lucene

Other Packages 
Package Description
com.jalios.servlet  
com.jalios.servlet.http  
This document is the API specification for Jalios JCMS 9.0

The classes around which you'll find the most useful informations are:
  • Channel, to retrieving data, to access site properties, to register StoreListener, DataController and AlarmEntry, etc.
  • JcmsUtil, for miscelleanous convenient methods completing Util and ServletUtil
  • Data, Publication, Content
  • Workspace, Group, Member
